function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Spread of contagious diseases due to lack of public health measures","Impact":"Increase in the prevalence of health risk behaviors and psychological disorders","Mitigation":"Implementing public health measures such as social distancing and home confinement","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps and virtual healthcare platforms","People":"General population","Owner":"Health ministries and public health organizations"},{"Description":"Mental and behavioral disorders due to social distancing and home confinement","Impact":"Increase in anxiety, depression, PTSD, and substance abuse","Mitigation":"Providing mental health support services, promoting social connections, and addressing economic hardships","Technologies":"Telemedicine, mental health apps, and online support groups","People":"General population","Owner":"Mental health professionals and community organizations"},{"Description":"High rates of anxiety and depression during quarantines","Impact":"Adverse effects on mental health and well-being","Mitigation":"Providing psychological support, maintaining social connections, and addressing economic challenges","Technologies":"Telepsychiatry, online therapy platforms, and financial assistance programs","People":"General population","Owner":"Healthcare providers and community support organizations"}]}
